text:
Freshman year: flood
Sophomore year: hurricane Sandy
Junior year: power outage 
Senior year: mad snow days
Now: the wind blew too hard
@epawawx big power outage in Bloomsburg. 36K people affected. No prediction on when it will be fixed.
This minor power outage is a big eye opener to how poorly I would manage in an apocalypse.
#BUAlert: Classes are cancelled until 4 p.m. due to widespread power outage. More details to follow.
